Game - Class in crazyballrun.game
The Game-Class initializes and runs the Game-Engines.

Specifies the game mode.

Enumeration of all game states.

The GameConstants class contains all available constants used in the game.

GameFunctions - Class in crazyballrun.game
The GameFunctions class overs access to main game functionality, like 'accelerate current player', 'use break for player' and many more.

GameSettings - Class in crazyballrun.game
The GameSettings stores user defines game constants (resolution, color depth, refresh rate of the screen, etc.).

GUIConfigurationParser - Class in crazyballrun.game.gui
The GUIConfigurationParser reads the GUI configuration file and translates it into different GUI-screens (called "Frames") and their content (GUI controls like buttons, textboxes, messages, etc.).

Constructor of the GUIConfigurationParser.
GUIControl - Class in crazyballrun.game.gui
The abstract class GUIControl provides basic functionality for GUI controls and an interface for the implementation of GUI-elements.

GUIControlFactory - Class in crazyballrun.game.gui
The GUIControlFactory is used to create any possible GUI component by a unique string identifier.

GUIEngine - Class in crazyballrun.game.gui
